SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Zhib aims at an enemy and throws a knife. If the knife hits, the
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: target is executed but it can be dodged. Zhib only has one knife,
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description3: but he can pick it up after throwing them.

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Zhib throws a device that alerts and attracts nearby enemies for
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: … seconds. After this time has passed, Zhib can pick up the
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description3: device and use it again when it recharges.

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Zhib targets an enemy and executes him. If there is another enemy
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: inside a close range, he will slash through the first one onto
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description3: the second one, executing him as well. This chain kill extends to

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Nerala aims at an enemy and fires a dart from her wrist that
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: makes enemies drowsy for … seconds. Drowsy enemies detect players slower.

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Nerala deploys a device that releases smoke in a given area
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: during … seconds, making her invisible to the eyes of enemies
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description3: while inside it. The smoke bomb only has … charges.

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Nerala deploys a minuscule machine that she can control from afar
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: during … seconds. This machine can execute enemies and is
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description3: invisible to their eyes, but can still be heard. The machine will
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description4: be destroyed if it’s detected by an enemy, it flies out of a
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description5: given range, it kills … enemies or the batteries run out.

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Omozra points at an ally or himself, prompting Sadiq to emerge
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: from the sand and spit on them, healing … hp points.

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Omozra targets an enemy, commanding Sadiq to emerge from the sand and
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: eat them. Sadly, Sadiq will also eat any spice that the enemy might carry.

SceneTransitionDescriptions.description1: Omozra points at an ally, prompting Sadiq to emerge from the sand
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description2: and partly swallow them. While the ally is inside Sadiq, Omozra
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description3: can move, but not cast any other abilities. Then, Omozra points
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description4: at a desired spot inside a given range and Sadiq pops up and
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description5: regurgitates the ally before disappearing under the sand again
SceneTransitionDescriptions.description6: This ability can’t be casted on Omozra himself.
